original_text: The Lord has been kind to me, so that the king, his helpers and his powerful officers have helped me. Because the Lord my God has been with me, he has helped me to be strong. I have been able to bring many of the leaders of Israel to Jerusalem with me.
korean_text: 또 나로 왕과 그의 보좌관들 앞과 왕의 권세 있는 모든 방백의 앞에서 은혜를 얻게 하셨도다 내 하나님 여호와의 손이 내 위에 있으므로 내가 힘을 얻어 이스라엘 중에 우두머리들을 모아 나와 함께 올라오게 하였노라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has been kind to me
so that the king, his helpers and his powerful officers have helped me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 왕과 그의 도우미들과 강력한 장관들이 나를 도왔다

sentences.original_text: Because the Lord my God has been with me
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 하나님 주님께서 나와 함께 계셨기 때문에

sentences.original_text: he has helped me to be strong
I have been able to bring many of the leaders of Israel to Jerusalem with me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이스라엘의 많은 지도자들을 나와 함께 예루살렘으로 데려올 수 있었다
